class.name: NoBracketingException

javadoc.text: Exception to be thrown when function values have the same sign at both * ends of an interval.
Value at lower end of the interval.
Value at higher end of the interval.

javadoc.param: lo Lower end of the interval.
hi Higher end of the interval.
fLo Value at lower end of the interval.
fHi Value at higher end of the interval.

javadoc.text: Construct the exception with a specific context.
javadoc.param: specific Contextual information on what caused the exception.
lo Lower end of the interval.
hi Higher end of the interval.
fLo Value at lower end of the interval.
fHi Value at higher end of the interval.

javadoc.text: Get the lower end of the interval.
Get the higher end of the interval.
Get the value at the lower end of the interval.
javadoc.return: the value at the lower end.

javadoc.text: Get the value at the higher end of the interval.
javadoc.return: the value at the higher end.
